directions.text: Steep saffron in 2 cups of warm water for a 3 mins.
Bring the water to a boil.
While bringing water to boil melt butter in a large shallow pan on high heat.
Immediately add rice and salt to the pan, stir occasionally.
When water is boiling transfer water to pan, turn heat to very low and cover pan.
Let rice cook for 20 mins, then lift cover for 5 secs and continue to cook for 5 mins.
